mapper.select: SELECT p.permission_id, p.permission_name FROM user AS u LEFT JOIN user_role AS ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role AS r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permission AS rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permission AS p ON p.permission_id = rp.permission_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId}
